creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: five hollow rings ending in curlicues; four panels of animals on each ring; motifs from left to right: three rat-like creatures, dog, rooster and monkey, goat and horse, snake, rat and dog; panels separated by vertical lines; closure solid piece with three cones attached
dimension: 11 1/2 x 10 1/8 x 1 3/4 in. (29.21 x 25.72 x 4.45 cm) (with chain dangling)
title: Torque
